Mixer.cpp

00001 /*
00002  * Mixer.cpp
00003  *
00004  *  Created on: 31.07.2010
00005  *      Author: gerstrong
00006  *
00007  *  This class is an own mixer.
00008  *  In the past we have been using SDL_MixAudio
00009  *  I think that led to many problems,
00010  */
00011 
00012 #include <SDL.h>
00013 
00014 #define WAVE_SILENCE_U8         128
00015 #define WAVE_SILENCE_S8         0
00016 
00017 #define WAVE_SILENCE_U16        32768
00018 #define WAVE_SILENCE_S16        0
00019 
00020 /**
00021  * This will mix 16-bit signed streams together.
00022  */
00023 void mixAudioSinged16(Uint8 *dst, const Uint8 *src, Uint32 len, Uint8 volume)
00024 {
00025  len /= 2;
00026  Sint16 *s_dst = (Sint16*)dst;
00027  Sint16 *s_src = (Sint16*)src;
00028  Sint32 chnl_src=0;
00029  Sint32 chnl_dst=0;
00030  Sint32 outputValue=0;
00031 
00032     for ( Uint32 i=0 ; i<len ; i++ ) {
00033      chnl_src = *s_src;
00034      chnl_dst = *s_dst;
00035 
00036         chnl_src *= volume;
00037         chnl_src /= SDL_MIX_MAXVOLUME;
00038 
00039         outputValue = chnl_src + chnl_dst;  // just add the channels
00040         if (outputValue > 32767)
00041          outputValue = 32767;         // and clip the result
00042         if (outputValue < -32768)
00043          outputValue = -32768;   // and clip the result
00044 
00045         *s_dst = outputValue;
00046 
00047         s_src++;
00048         s_dst++;
00049     }
00050 }
00051 
00052 /**
00053  * This will mix 8-bit unsigned streams together.
00054  */
00055 void mixAudioUnsinged8(Uint8 *dst, const Uint8 *src, Uint32 len, Uint8 volume)
00056 {
00057     Sint32 chnl_src=0;
00058     Sint32 chnl_dst=0;
00059     Sint32 outputValue=0;           // just add the channels
00060     for (Uint32 i=0;i<len;i++) {
00061         chnl_src = *src;
00062         chnl_dst = *dst;
00063 
00064         chnl_src -= WAVE_SILENCE_U8;
00065         chnl_dst -= WAVE_SILENCE_U8;
00066 
00067         chnl_src *= volume;
00068         chnl_src /= SDL_MIX_MAXVOLUME;
00069 
00070         outputValue = chnl_src + chnl_dst + WAVE_SILENCE_U8;           // just add the channels
00071         if (outputValue > 255) outputValue = 255;        // and clip the result
00072         if (outputValue < 0) outputValue = 0;
00073 
00074         *dst = outputValue;
00075 
00076         src++;
00077         dst++;
00078     }
00079 }
00080 
00081 /**
00082  * Our own Mix function for Audio Streams
00083  */
00084 void mixAudio(Uint8 *dst, const Uint8 *src, Uint32 len, Uint8 volume, Uint16 format)
00085 {
00086  if(format == AUDIO_S16)
00087   mixAudioSinged16(dst, src, len, volume);
00088  else if(format == AUDIO_U8)
00089   mixAudioUnsinged8(dst, src, len, volume);
00090 }
